MR No. 729 - Angels in Human Form Converse With Us

     Christ and His angels come to us in the form of human beings, and as we converse with them, light and grace and joy fill our hearts. Our spiritual energies are quickened, and we are strengthened to do the will of God. Though we know it not, we are conversing with an angel, an angel in human guise.--Letter 144, 1902, p. 8. (To Dr. and Mrs. D. H. Kress, September 18, 1902.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. May 30, 1979
